mainsection.title: The Invisible Luthor / The Talent Agency Fraud / The Spy Ring Of Righab Bey / The Dukalia Spy Ring
mainsection.titlesort: Invisible Luthor / The Talent Agency Fraud / The Spy Ring Of Righab Bey / The Dukalia Spy Ring
mainsection.plot: "The Invisible Luthor" - Buildings vanish and the water in Metropolis stops flowing. Superman investigates the demands made in a huge ransom, and finds Lex Luthor behind it all. "The Talent Agency Fraud" - Clark finds the Daily Planet downcast, with the exception of Lois Lane. She's been offered a career in acting, but Clark smells a fraud and begins to investigate. "The Spy Ring of Righab Bey" - Lois and Clark notice a defense department employee leaving an astrologer's office and decide to investigate. He's hypnotizing clients and forcing them to reveal secrets, and doesn't appreciate getting caught. "The Dukalia Spy Ring" - Athletes from Dukalia perform a demonstration in public that seems anti-American. Lois and Clark investigate, both getting captured as they discover a ring of spies stealing American technology.

link.description: Superman, Vol. 1 #10 at Core for Comics

comic.fulltitle: The Invisible Luthor / The Talent Agency Fraud / The Spy Ring Of Righab Bey / The Dukalia Spy Ring
comic.allcreators: Jerry Siegel; Leo Nowak; Wayne Boring; Shuster Shop; Paul Cassidy

mainsection.title: The Exile At The Edge Of Eternity / The Legend Of Earth Prime
mainsection.titlesort: Exile At The Edge Of Eternity / The Legend Of Earth Prime
mainsection.plot:
The Exile at the Edge of Eternity - This retells the story of Adam and Eve from the perspective of Superman.

The Legend of Earth Prime - In the year 2230, researchers debate the truth of Superman's secret identity.

mainsection.title: Tundra!
mainsection.plot: Exploding from the pages of the X-Men comes Canada's premier super-team - Alpha Flight! The monstrous Sasquatch, the mystical Shaman, the twins, Aurora and Northstar, the divine Snowbird, the tumbling Puck (1st appearance), the aquatic beauty, Marrina (1st appearance), and their leader, Vindicator, must reunite to stop the destructive elemental force known as Tundra. NOTE: Also 1st appearance of Omega Flight (Diamond Lil, Wild Child, Flashback,& Smart Alec).

link.description: Alpha Flight, Vol. 1 #1A at Core for Comics
